summary: This spell will add gold to the player.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a spell to the player that can add gold to the player. To add gold to the player cast the spell and a menu will pop up showing a number at the top which represents how much gold you want to add to the player. Then click the 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000, or 100000 to add that value of gold. To subtract the amount of gold click the - button and select 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000, or 100000 to subtract that value of gold. Once you are done press Done to add the gold to the player. This mod is good for players who hate using the console commands to add gold to the player. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1007/?]here[/url]. And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/46053?]Oblivion Septim Spell[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
